title: Club chat bug
body: Today, when I write something in any of my clubs, the writting will after a relogg be replaced with null. Also when other people in the club write something. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
That's really strange! Can you try leaving the club and rejoin to see if anything changes in the behaviour? 

Let me know what happens.

It was fixed with the evening patch i think. Everything that was shown as null was then visible. Leaving the club and rejoin wouldn't help, also with reopening a new club it showed the same outcome.

Now it is still that when you revoke an invite for a club, all pending invited cannot be seen anymore (so it is necessary to relogg if some more club mangement is needed; but I will open a new thread about it)
same here, and i cannot access the store, I get an error.
